title: Casemiro's Big Payday
description:
The FC crew react to Real Madrid and Manchester United reaching an agreement for Casemiro to join the Red Devils. The guys debate if this deal makes sense for Manchester United and argue if his new contract is the main reason why the Brazilian is making the move. Plus, Julien Laurens joins the show to break down the fallout from Mbappe and Neymar's penalty disagreement.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Casemiro set to join Manchester United; Man United vs Liverpool preview; Galtier plays down PSG penalty incident
